title: Light Diamond Texture Pack [1.0.1]
briefDescription: Hello everyone! Today I want to present to you my Light Diamond 32x Texture Pack! The base of this Pack is high-resolution Vanilla Textures, but ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hello everyone! Today I want to present to you my Light Diamond 32x Texture Pack! The base of this Pack is high-resolution Vanilla Textures, but also includes some additions and features. I?ve been painting textures for quite some time now, but right now I?ve decided to completely relaunch and publish ?Light Diamond?. I have quite a few ideas, some may already be implemented, but I am still working on them. From time to time I will update these textures, publishing only those textures that I am confident in.
Blocks with animations:
Ancient Debris
Blast Furnace
The Core of the Beacon
Beehive and Bee Nest
Campfire
Brewing Stand

Also I made different variations of blocks:
Bookshelf (50+ variations)
Cake (30+ variations)
Waterlily (100+ variations)
Cactus (8+ variations)

Other textures:
Anvil and Acacia Trapdoor
Bamboo
Basalt and Blackstone
Oak Planks and Barrel
Blue Ice
Bone Block
Diamond Block

I added 1 of the symbols of my Texture Pack ? Diamond Block! ?
Allow, Deny and Border (Education Edition)
Experiment for new experiences!
Rain
Snow

title: Java 1.7 Animations
briefDescription: Do you hate the vanilla bedrock player animations and general feel of the new bedrock? Or maybe you want yet another way to make bedrock ...
Description: My contacts: discord: ambient#2309 Youtube channel (subscribe if you want to see more packs!)

crawledImageUrls.text: Do you hate the vanilla bedrock player animations and general feel of the new bedrock? Or maybe you want yet another way to make bedrock closer to java PVP. Look no further, because this pack makes many improvements and tweaks to player animations to more closely resemble Java edition 1.7 (and even bedrock 1.12!).
One of the most notable changes is the tweaking of right hand position and rotation, both in 1st and 3rd person. Body rotation has also been tweaked to more closely resemble java edition.
The armor now will turn red when players take damage. You can also change the tint to match bedrock edition 1.12 in the subpacks section. Damage particles are included.
The player now has the 1.7 ?punch-eating? animation when eating food or drinking a potion, just look down at the floor to activate.
The fire model now extends throughout the entire player?s body, like in java edition. The orange fire overlay has also been disabled.
Inventory shift-clicking animations, slot border, and hotbar popping animations have been disabled, as they appear in Java edition. Thanks for the help LukasPAH!
The player model now renders 2D in the start and pause menu, like bedrock edition 1.12.
A visual sword blocking animation has been added when you crouch to sneak, and can be disabled with subpacks to fit your preference.
Fishing rods now have critical hit particles and the bobber is 2D. All other projectiles are now scaled according to their distance from the camera, like in Java edition.

title: Geographycal Items Plus (GIP)
briefDescription: Many people in the minecraft community have complained about the textures of the maps, to be more precise the texture of the filled map. It ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Many people in the minecraft community have complained about the textures of the maps, to be more precise the texture of the filled map. It was for that reason that I redesigned that, and now the difference between an empty map and a filled map is more noticeable (also I redesigned the textures of the other maps)
The compass was also modified, adding the classic blue needle that indicates south.
This texture pack mainly changes what the game maps are, now it will be easier to recognize an empty map with a filled map. Also the textures of: mansion map, monument map, treasure map and locked map were changed.
The texture of the compass was changed in the same way, now it has the classic blue needle that will indicate where you come from (the red indicates where your spawn is)
* FILLED MAP*

*TREASURE MAP*
(since this point some images will be seeing with some bars on their borders, sorry for that)
*LOCKED MAP*
*MANSION L. MAP*
*MONUMENT L. MAP*
*COMPASS*
(Once you use the compass on the lodestone it stops having this texture)

title: Custom Damage Particles
briefDescription: Have you ever wished that bedrock edition had more cool PVP/aesthetic features like the Java Edition? Or maybe you wish to spruce up your ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever wished that bedrock edition had more cool PVP/aesthetic features like the Java Edition? Or maybe you wish to spruce up your bedrock PVP experience, then this pack is perfect for you. Whenever you or another player take damage, unique particles emit. You can choose between 13 total different settings and color options for even further customizability.
This pack comes with 13 total different subpacks. Choose between the default color (the marine-green color from the original java edition sharpness particles ), red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, pink, rainbow (user favorite), and epilepsy (flickering black and white, if you?re into that). You are also given the ability to add multipliers to the default and rainbow colors for a more?outstanding? experience.

title: RE-FAULT PvP Texture Pack (32?32)
briefDescription: Were you looking for a simple pvp texture but well optimized? Then this texture is for you. RE-FAULT works well on android and ios and ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Were you looking for a simple pvp texture but well optimized? Then this texture is for you. RE-FAULT works well on android and ios and windows 10 mobile phones. This texture will not be famous for its highly detailed texture, but it has many advantages: 1. animation of ore blocks, 2. quality texture of blocks and objects, 3. texture sterilized under orange color.
